channel.title: General UTXMP Discussion
channel.description: The place to discuss anything relating to Unreal Tournament: Expanded Multiplayer.

item.title: Anyone still around?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jackal)
item.dc:creator: Jackal
item.content:encoded: SS (Solid Snake) was looking for the devs. Had some questions about it. PM him or he might be in #fragbu on the ETG IRC server.

item.title: Still 1 Server online
item.author: invalid@example.com (Captain_Tea)
item.dc:creator: Captain_Tea
item.content:encoded: I realize that these are archived forums but there is still one server standing. If you're up for some UTXMP stop by

item.title: Dedicated server install info...
item.author: invalid@example.com (PRG)
item.dc:creator: PRG
item.content:encoded:
First off. I am not an experienced server admin, so bear with me. What follows should work MOST of the time. (and did in the testing of this patch.)
Most of this is the regrettably deprarted Dubious' work. I pulled the necessary stuff from the now unavailable turnkey server install by Dubious.

Obviously, first you need a working UT2k4 WINDOWS server.. (I know linux about as well as I know Sanskrit.)

Then you need this.......

Dedicated server install info...

item.title: Changelog has been updated--Woot!
item.author: invalid@example.com (pistos)
item.dc:creator: pistos
item.content:encoded: FMI and hence UTXMP lives and continues to move forward!

item.title: WAZAAA got a question
item.author: invalid@example.com (TortiseTank)
item.dc:creator: TortiseTank
item.content:encoded:
I have a question could someone make it possible to use the wepons and vehicle replacer for UT2k4 for we can use all the UTXMP stuff in other gametypes? I was just wondering, there is the U2wepons muttator but it only covers a few wepons and also doesn't have the secondary fires the only wepons also that work are the assault rilfe(primary only) SniperRifle(pri and zoom work) pistol(pri and the 3rd person cam is a epic games assault rifle) and staff rifle(fires shock rifle pri and sec) and...

WAZAAA got a question

item.title: Conc-Jump Mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com ([GDC]Faust)
item.dc:creator: [GDC]Faust
item.content:encoded:
Made it: http://www.utxmp.de/portal/index.php...wnload&gid=134

You can adjust your own momentum as you wish. Right now it could be considered pretty high with 20000, but that's perfect for conc-jumping Plus, you can use the grenadelauncher to throw around those nasty juggers again.

item.title: Something to fix the weapons till the next patch.
item.author: invalid@example.com ([GDC]Faust)
item.dc:creator: [GDC]Faust
item.content:encoded:
I hope FMI won't hate me for this but I felt like there has to be done something so I started to code my own little mutator to alter/fix some weapons until the next patch comes out. I'm kind of constantly working on it but you can always download the latest version here: http://www.utxmp.de/portal/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=121&Itemid=115

The changelog is in german so I'll give you the changes here:

Grenade Launcher:
- reloadtime reduced by half

Assault...

Something to fix the weapons till the next patch.

Some other maps will follows in the next days.

item.title: 2006 but still mondays funzocken
item.author: invalid@example.com ([-MF-] Fara)
item.dc:creator: [-MF-] Fara
item.content:encoded: hey guys, now it's 2006 but the mondays funzocken on the mf-server at 8pm. gmt+1 or 11est hasn't changed, so join the public utxmp game if you like. i hope we will see you all soon.

item.title: "jumps r us" and other mapping units
item.author: invalid@example.com (Oakwind)
item.dc:creator: Oakwind
item.content:encoded:
I did some extensive jump testing a while back to get distances and heights of various jumps, so that I could design a map that would limit access to certain areas to certain classes. Trick jumping would add extra depth to some maps.

But unfortunately I have lost interest in utxmp. After the long wait for utxmp, and playing it after UT2K4, I find the movement very unresponsive. That and the lack of good servers have pretty much killed the game for me.

So, I've decided to release the...

"jumps r us" and other mapping units
